channel.title: Sprite color editing help
channel.description:
Problem: I made a Mod and Admin amulet, i got the name, coloring in inventory, examine and stats correct, however i cant get the wieldable color to change. I want the staff amulets to be black(3158064) or red (i dono color code for red), so players and other staff know they arnet using them for pking, dueling, ect
i looked in all the files i thought it would be in itemwieldable def, item def, ect... and i cant find it, i believe its the same process as making a green or pink sword, so if anyone know how to do that, tell me please :p and i could probibly take it from there :3
P.S. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363007.0.html nice guide, tells you everything you need to know... except changing the wield color... and if it does say it im just retarded and didnt see it :p
that guide should be stickied with the landscape editor link, we need more custom servers, less crap pk this rscdv25 no editing servers

item.title: Sprite color editing help
item.dc:creator: @hornyhamster hornyhamster
item.description:
@hornyhamster wrote:

i already stated i know the comor code >.< plus turns out lucien ammy was already black, all i had to do was change the wield sprite to 172 (black ammy) so this is resolved

Read full topic

item.title: Sprite color editing help
item.dc:creator: @Old_Rsc_Player Old Rsc Player
item.description:
@Old_Rsc_Player wrote:

[quote=“hornyhamster, post:4, topic:298922”]gawdz 0 make it the same as in the item sprite, that would be white :3 i know the code for black i just needed to know where to put it, Ty Kakur007 i’ll update it

Gawdz go turn your server back on im bored of coding stuffz :D[/quote]

get a color code chart

Read full topic

item.title: Sprite color editing help
item.dc:creator: @kakur007 kakur007
item.description:
@kakur007 wrote:

You can change wieldable items colour into animations. Look into client side, under conf there should be animations, theres colours for wieldable items

Read full topic
